Name: Spear Master
About the game: For centuries, brave warriors called 'Spear Masters' have protected the world. You are the son of a legendary hero, it is now your turn to follow in the footsteps of your 'Inuit' ancestors and save the world from an ancient evil. Spear Master is a fast-paced action game where you throw spears at bouncing balls in order to split them. Destroy enemies, solve puzzles, talk to characters, fight against ferocious bosses and save the world from the terrible Tarr! What to expect? Use your skills and reflexes to survive Intense Boss Battles Fight your way through 120+ levels Solve puzzles to unlock access to secret areas Unlock new items and gear at the shop (no in-app purchases) Keyboard, mouse & controller support
